inlineContent.text: IEEE 754-compliant rounding modes. Precision is specified in bits and can be
adjusted at any time. Unlike GMP’s
Memory is automatically managed through Swift’s ARC. The underlying
structure is initialized on creation and cleared on deallocation.
provides value semantics with automatic memory management
storage until one needs to be mutated, at which point a copy is made
This struct uses a private storage class to implement COW semantics,
ensuring that value semantics are maintained while minimizing unnecessary
